DOC.brief_summary: This randomise clinical trial aim determine whether immunization schedule comprise two dos Gardasil administer six month apart non-inferior schedule comprise three dos administer 0 , 6 60 month prevention HPV-16 HPV-18 infection persist least six month , ten year initial vaccination . The study hypothesis two-dose schedule would offer similar protection three-dose schedule persistent HPV-16/18 infection .
DOC.brief_title: ICI-VPH : Impact HPV Immunisation Schedules Against HPV
